short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites and show a dog image with barking sound when accessed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🐶 Watchdog - No Distractions

Boost your productivity and stay focused with 🐶 Watchdog - No Distractions, the ultimate Chrome extension for managing digital distractions.

Key Features:

1. 🚫 Easy Site Blocking: Quickly add distracting websites to your block list with just a few clicks.
2. 🖱️ One-Click Current Site Block: Instantly block the site you're currently on if you find it's hindering your productivity.
3. 📝 Customizable Block List: Manage your personalized list of blocked sites directly from the extension popup.
4. 🐕 User-Friendly Interface: Clean, intuitive design inspired by a friendly golden retriever – your loyal companion in the fight against procrastination.
5. 🧩 Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with Chrome, providing a non-intrusive yet effective way to control your browsing habits.

Watchdog - No Distractions empowers you to take control of your online time, helping you stay on task and achieve your goals. Whether you're a student trying to study, a professional aiming to meet deadlines, or anyone looking to cultivate better digital habits, this extension is your faithful ally in creating a distraction-free browsing environment.

Take charge of your productivity today with Watchdog - No Distractions! 🚀
